title: Hold
description: *Those sexy, wild, hard-loving triplets are back! *From bestselling author Cora Brent, the Gentry saga continues with plenty of action, plenty of sex, and of course those fierce yet lovable alphas, the Gentry boys.They all said we were trash and would end up dead or in prison.They were wrong.The three of us brothers endured hell together and somehow climbed out battle-scarred but whole.We are no longer the ferocious boys who punched our way through terrible days and went to bed hungry every night.Now we've got love, we've got hope, and we've got each other.But in order to hold on to everything that matters, we'll need to confront the vicious demons of the past...one last time.**HOLD is the newest story in the Gentry saga. **
author: Cora Brent
